control.visible: Skin.HasSetting(AlternateSubMenu) + [Container(9000).HasFocus(11) | Container(9000).HasFocus(10) | Container(9000).HasFocus(1) | Container(9000).HasFocus(2) | Container(9000).HasFocus(3) | Container(9000).HasFocus(5)]

Skin.HasSetting(AlternateSubMenu) + [Container(9000).HasFocus(11) | Container(9000).HasFocus(10) | Container(9000).HasFocus(1) | Container(9000).HasFocus(2) | Container(9000).HasFocus(3) | Container(9000).HasFocus(5)]

control.content:
8 ActivateWindow(Weather) special://skin/backgrounds/weather.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Home_Custom_Back_Weather_Folder)] !Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoWeatherButton) !Skin.HasSetting(ShowWeatherFanart) | IsEmpty(Skin.String(WeatherFanartDir))
8 ActivateWindow(Weather) special://skin/backgrounds/weather.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(WeatherFanartDir)]$INFO[Weather.FanartCode] !Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoWeatherButton) Skin.HasSetting(ShowWeatherFanart) + !IsEmpty(Skin.String(WeatherFanartDir))
1 ActivateWindow(Pictures) special://skin/backgrounds/pictures.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Home_Custom_Back_Pictures_Folder)] !Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoPicturesButton)
2 ActivateWindow(Music) special://skin/backgrounds/music.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Home_Custom_Back_Music_Folder)] !Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoMusicButton)
3 ActivateWindow(Videos) special://skin/backgrounds/videos.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Home_Custom_Back_Video_Folder)] !Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoVideosButton) + ![Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoMoviesButton) + Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoTVShowsButton)]
3 ActivateWindow(VideoFiles) special://skin/backgrounds/videos.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Home_Custom_Back_Video_Folder)] !Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoVideosButton) + [Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoMoviesButton) + Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoTVShowsButton)]
20342 ActivateWindow(VideoLibrary,MovieTitles,return) special://skin/backgrounds/videos.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Home_Custom_Back_Movies_Folder)] Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoMoviesButton) + Library.HasContent(Movies)
20343 ActivateWindow(VideoLibrary,TVShowTitles,return) special://skin/backgrounds/videos.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Home_Custom_Back_TVShow_Folder)] Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoTVShowsButton) + Library.HasContent(TVShows)
<-- Custom Home -->
Custom Movie One $INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom1_Label)] special://skin/backgrounds/custom.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom1_Folder)] $INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom1_Path)] Skin.HasSetting(Menu_Custom1)
Custom Movie Two $INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom2_Label)] special://skin/backgrounds/custom.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom2_Folder)] $INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom2_Path)] Skin.HasSetting(Menu_Custom2)
Custom Movie Three $INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom3_Label)] special://skin/backgrounds/custom.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom3_Folder)] $INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom3_Path)] Skin.HasSetting(Menu_Custom3)
Custom Movie Seven $INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom7_Label)] special://skin/backgrounds/custom.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom7_Folder)] $INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom7_Path)] Skin.HasSetting(Menu_Custom7)
Custom Movie Eight $INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom8_Label)] special://skin/backgrounds/custom.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom8_Folder)] $INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom8_Path)] Skin.HasSetting(Menu_Custom8)
Custom Movie Four $INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom4_Label)] special://skin/backgrounds/custom.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom4_Folder)] XBMC.ActivateWindow(10025,$INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom4_Path)],return) Skin.HasSetting(Menu_Custom4)
Custom Movie Five $INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom5_Label)] special://skin/backgrounds/custom.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom5_Folder)] XBMC.ActivateWindow(10025,$INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom5_Path)],return) Skin.HasSetting(Menu_Custom5)
Custom Movie Six $INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom6_Label)] special://skin/backgrounds/custom.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom6_Folder)] XBMC.ActivateWindow(10025,$INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom6_Path)],return) Skin.HasSetting(Menu_Custom6)
Custom Movie Nine $INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom9_Label)] special://skin/backgrounds/custom.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom9_Folder)] XBMC.ActivateWindow(10025,$INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom9_Path)],return) Skin.HasSetting(Menu_Custom9)
Custom Movie TEn $INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom10_Label)] special://skin/backgrounds/custom.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom10_Folder)] XBMC.ActivateWindow(10025,$INFO[Skin.String(Menu_Custom10_Path)],return) Skin.HasSetting(Menu_Custom10)
<-- Custom Home -->
0 ActivateWindow(Programs,Addons,return) special://skin/backgrounds/programs.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Home_Custom_Back_Programs_Folder)] !Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoProgramsButton)
13000 ActivateWindow(Settings) special://skin/backgrounds/settings.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Home_Custom_Back_Settings_Folder)] !Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoSettingsButton)
